item.title: Xamarin Forms staggered view - Masonry
item.description: Some story background When developing mobile apps, you’ll often find different design trends that look great and sometimes you even want to adopt some of those trends in your own apps.

item.title: Xamarin Forms – Set entry clear icon color on iOS
item.description: Here is a small piece of code that you can use as a Xamarin Forms effect to hook into your entry.
